snippet.title: Fate/Samurai Remnant - Third Trailer
snippet.description:
Your wish shall perish..." A Holy Grail War begins in Edo Japan.

Pre-order now: https://bit.ly/3Qur0bX

"Your wish will lie shattered." - Saber

In this new trailer for Fate/Samurai Remnant, take a glimpse into the deeper aspects of the story and the various elements you will experience in the town of Edo.

Fate/Samurai Remnant is scheduled to release September 29, 2023 on PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Nintendo Switch™, and Steam®, and is currently available for pre-order.

The "Waxing Moon Ritual", a battle to the death between seven Masters and their Servants to pursue their wishes...

Join the #KTFamily:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/koeitecmous
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/koeitecmous
Discord: discord.gg/KTFamily
